extensionName.message: BirdTab - Discover Bird Pictures & Songs in New Tabs

extensionDescription.message: Enhance your Chrome new tab with beautiful bird photos and soothing sounds. Enjoy a refreshing bird background every time.

audioAlt.description: Alt text for audio waveform icon

errorTitle.message: Hmm, the birds seem shy today

errorMessage.message: We're having a bit of trouble spotting our feathered friends. Don't worry, it's usually just a momentary flutter!
errorMessage.description: Error message when bird data fails to load

regionTooltip.message: Choose the region where you'd like to see birds from. You'll still see birds from around the world!

regionHelpText.message: This helps us show birds you might spot in your area.

autoPlayHelpText.message: Play bird songs automatically with each new tab. Quiet hours will override this when active.

autoPlayTooltip.message: Enable to automatically play bird calls when you open a new tab

quietHoursHelpText.message: Mute bird songs during specified quiet hours.
quietHoursHelpText.description: Help text for quiet hours setting

quietHoursTooltip.message: Enable to automatically turn off auto-play during quiet hours

quietHoursAlt.description: Alt text for quiet hours moon icon

productivityHelpText.message: Enable search box, top sites, and custom shortcuts for enhanced productivity.

productivityTooltip.message: Show search box, most visited sites, and allow custom shortcuts

welcomeDescription1.message: Get ready for a daily dose of avian wonder! Every new tab brings you face-to-face with a stunning bird photograph and fascinating facts.

welcomeDescription2.message: It's like having a window to the bird world right in your browser!

regionSelectionDescription.message: Select your preferred region to see birds commonly found in your area. Don't worry, you'll still get to explore birds from around the world!

regionSelectionHelpText.message: This helps us show you birds that you might spot in your local area. You can change this anytime in the settings.
regionSelectionHelpText.description: Help text for region selection in onboarding

birdCallsTitle.message: Bird Calls: Music to Your Ears?
birdCallsTitle.description: Title for bird calls onboarding step

birdCallsDescription.message: Want to hear the chirps and tweets? Enable auto-play for an immersive birding experience!

autoPlayNote.message: Don't worry, you can always toggle sounds on or off for each bird. This setting just determines the default behavior, and you can change it later if you wish.

reviewPromptMessage.message: Your review would mean the world to us and help other bird enthusiasts discover our extension!

leaveReview.description: Button text to leave a review

confirmResetSettings.message: This will reset all settings to defaults and show the onboarding again. Continue?

errorResettingSettings.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error resetting settings. Please try again.
errorResettingSettings.description: Error message when resetting settings fails

settingsResetComplete.message:
‚úÖ Settings Reset Complete!

All your BirdTab settings have been restored to their defaults.

Open a new tab to see the setup wizard again.
settingsResetComplete.description: Success message when settings are reset

errorClearingCache.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error clearing cache. Please try again.
errorClearingCache.description: Error message when clearing cache fails

cacheCleared.message:
üßπ Cache Cleared!

All cached bird images, custom shortcuts, and temporary data have been removed.

This should help if you were experiencing any loading issues.
cacheCleared.description: Success message when cache is cleared

permissionRequired.message:
üîí Permission Required

To use productivity features (search box, most visited sites, and custom shortcuts), BirdTab needs access to your browser's top sites.

You can enable this anytime by toggling the setting again.

somethingWentWrong.message:
‚ö†Ô∏è Something went wrong

We couldn't update your productivity settings. This might be a temporary issue.

Please try again in a moment. If the problem continues, try restarting your browser.
somethingWentWrong.description: Generic error message when something goes wrong

currentLocale.description: Shows current UI locale using predefined message

closeSettings.description: Aria label for close settings button

mostVisitedSitesAriaLabel.message: Most visited sites and custom shortcuts
mostVisitedSitesAriaLabel.description: Aria label for top sites grid

visitSiteAriaLabel.description: Aria label prefix for site links

websiteFallback.description: Fallback text when site title cannot be determined

addNewShortcutAriaLabel.description: Aria label for add shortcut button

editShortcutContextMenu.description: Context menu item to edit shortcut

removeShortcutContextMenu.description: Context menu item to remove shortcut

shortcutNameRequired.description: Error message when shortcut name is empty

shortcutUrlRequired.description: Error message when shortcut URL is empty

shortcutUrlInvalid.description: Error message when shortcut URL is invalid
